label.en: 24/25 S regular part 2 2 CP SV Eng
label.et: 24/25 K PÕ 2. osa 2 EAP SV Eng

objectives.en: The objective is to support the preparation, presentation and defence of the master's thesis.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda teadmised ja oskused magistritöö ettevalmistuseks, esitamiseks ja kaitsmiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) is able to plan their research and development work;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) on võimeline kavandama oma teadus-ja arendustegevuse alast tööd;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) is able to find, critically analyse and select necessary academic literature and other information;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) on võimeline leidma, kriitiliselt analüüsima ja valima vajalikku akadeemilist kirjandust ja muud informatsiooni;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) is aware of underlying principles and ethical aspects of research work;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) on teadlik teadustöö põhiprintsiipidest ja selle eetilistest aspektidest;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is able to actively participate in academic discussions.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) on võimeline osalema aktiivselt akadeemilistes diskussioonides.

independent_work.en:
1. Final draft of Research Methods with interview questions or questionnaire and list of possible respondents
2. Preliminary results.
3. Final master's thesis for pre-reviewing.
independent_work.et:
1. Final draft of Research Methods with interview questions or questionnaire and list of possible respondents
2. Preliminary results.
3. Final master's thesis for pre-reviewing.

description.en: Master's thesis research methods are passed according to the guidelines in the Moodle.
description.et: Master's thesis research methods are passed according to the guidelines in the Moodle.

description.en: Preliminary results and passed according to the guidelines in the Moodle.
description.et: Preliminary results and passed according to the guidelines in the Moodle.

description.en: The master thesis is uploaded in the Moodle for pre-reviewing.
description.et: The master thesis is uploaded in the Moodle for pre-reviewing.

grade_evaluation.en: All three homework are presented and passed.
grade_evaluation.et: All three homework are presented and passed.

debt_elimination.en: Special arrangements are carried out in agreement with the lecturer in accordance with the UT study organization regulations.
debt_elimination.et: Special arrangements are carried out in agreement with the lecturer in accordance with the UT study organization regulations.

results_available_from.en: The evaluation results are entered into the learning information system within two weeks after the final evaluation.
results_available_from.et: The evaluation results are entered into the learning information system within two weeks after the final evaluation.
